report.title: POMS My Walks: Walks relevant for an Indicia user
report.description: A list of top level samples for use in the POMS My Walks report calendar grid. At the time of writing, this is the same as the EBMS report but with the addition of Butterfly/Bee Hoverfly mode label.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON l.id=lav.location_id AND lav.deleted=false AND lav.location_attribute_id=#alloc_id# AND lav.int_value=#cms_user_id# LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_id=s.id AND sav.sample_attribute_id=#mode_smp_attr_id# AND sav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND (s.created_by_id=#user_id# OR lav.id IS NOT NULL) #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, -- The link is built in build_link in report_calendar_grid. We can avoid the need to change code by -- just adding the mode on the end of the location name which is currently used at the label CASE WHEN sav.int_value IS NULL THEN COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) WHEN sav.int_value = #butterflies_tt_id# THEN COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) || ' (Butterflies)' WHEN sav.int_value = #bees_hoverflies_tt_id# THEN COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) || ' (Bees/Hoverflies)' WHEN sav.int_value = #bees_tt_id# THEN COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) || ' (Bees)' WHEN sav.int_value = #hoverflies_tt_id# THEN COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) || ' (Hoverflies)' WHEN sav.int_value = #bees_morpho_tt_id# THEN COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) || ' (Bees morpho-groups)' WHEN sav.int_value = #hoverflies_morpho_tt_id# THEN COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) || ' (Hoverflies morpho-groups)' END as location_name, s.location_id, l.code, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type
